attributes.action: Make household recycling a legal requirement
attributes.background: There are no current laws in the UK about household recycling. There are hundreds of homes not recycling and every year thousands of tons of rubbish which could be recycled are sent to land fill. We need to make a greater effort to protect our planet and our oceans.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by a legal requirement.

If you mean that householders who do not recycle should be fined, you might like to sign this petition instead. You are more likely to get action if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253980
